name: Cool Forts Prevail
description:
Cool Forts Prevail is a tactical first person shooter that is all about
forts. You build forts, attack forts, and... uhm... other stuff about
forts. You can play with your friends (or enemies) using split-screen.

What you do is up to you. Do you just want to build and defend a fort? You
can do just that! Do you want to run over cartoon people with a weird
car? You're one download away!

This is an experimental game that i made to get more skilled with the genre, and hopefully you'll have fun playing it!
